effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.
